name: profile-perf
description: Performance testing and optimization framework for Uderia profiles. Compare execution metrics between profile types (@IDEAT vs @OPTIM), analyze strategic plans, identify optimization opportunities, and detect issues like recursive executions or inappropriate LLM result formats.
author: Claude + User
use_cases: Compare performance between IDEAT and OPTIM profiles
Analyze strategic plan efficiency for tool_enabled profiles
Validate LLM result formats and tool selections
Generate optimization reports with phase-by-phase breakdown
Test profile overrides via REST API
Benchmark query execution across profile types
Optimize prompts, plans, and execution steps
